title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: President Moon Jae-in has proposed that South Korea and Spain enhance theircooperation in overseas construction, the digital economy and renewable energy.The President made the comments this morning at a bilateral business forum in Seoul with King Filipe the Sixth of Spain.President Moon highlighted the immense potential the two countries have in joint construction projects overseas, with Korea's strength in construction and financing, and Spain in the design and management of facilities."The two countries have agreed to push for joint advancement in overseas construction to South and Central America and Asia and expand cooperation between public enterprises in railways, airlines and transportation.President Moon also said the two countries will have great synergy in the digital economy.He said they both have outstanding ICT infrastructure and can mutually prosper through partnerships in 5G-based services like autonomous cars and smart cities.They will also work together in battling climate change, by working to replace fossil fuels with renewable energy.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
